name: OMEGA Œ©‚Ñ¢
tagline: 3.6MB browser that never tracks, profiles, or sells data
description: OMEGA: an ultra-fast, security-first 3.6 MB native browser for macOS built on Apple architecture with Swift + WebKit. Opens in under a second, blocks trackers at the network level, fights fingerprinting, and refuses the surveillance economy. YouTube ads get neutralized. Amnesia Mode browses in RAM, leaves no trace, and disappears on quit. Hit Nuke to wipe cookies, cache, history, and site data. No profiling. No data brokerage. Just speed. Browse light. Browse free.

name: caricature.life
tagline: Create a minimalist caricature. No login. No tracking.
description: caricature.life started from a simple frustration. Every time I wanted a clean, minimalist caricature, I hit gated websites asking for logins, emails, and unclear privacy trade-offs. I built caricature.life to be the opposite. üîê No logins or signups üëÄ No tracking or stored photos ‚ú® No watermarks Upload a photo, generate your avatar, download it, and leave. Your face stays yours. Lifetime free and community supported ‚òï

name: Purifai
tagline: App-aware copy/paste that removes unsupported formatting
description: Text copied from AI tools or the web often pastes with fonts and headings you'd never use yourself, especially in email or chat. It immediately looks pasted. Paste text-only fixes the mess, but also removes bold text, lists, and structure, forcing you to rebuild everything by hand. Purifai cleans the text so it fits naturally in the app you're pasting into. It removes weird formatting while keeping paragraphs, lists, and spacing intact. Lightweight App (11MB). Fully offline. No tracking.

name: Movens
tagline: Your travel organizer, live on the Lock Screen
description: Movens is the ultimate private travel wallet. It organizes flights, tickets, and files securely on your device, completely offline and account-free. The standout feature is Live Activities. Users can view essential info, like Airbnb gate codes or flight seat numbers, directly on the Lock Screen. Even better, every PDF ticket and booking confirmation is instantly accessible via the Dynamic Island, eliminating the need to dig through emails at the gate.

name: Cloudchipr
tagline: Cloud costs observability,management and automation platform
description: Empower your team with AI agents to optimize cloud costs, answer questions, explain anomalies, send reports, assign tasks, and more.

name: OpenWork
tagline: Open-source Claude Work alternative, powered by OpenCode
description: OpenWork is an open-source desktop app for agentic work, built to be extensible from day one. Skills and plugins are installed via a built-in package manager and run on top of the growing OpenCode ecosystem. The focus is on making agentic workflows composable, inspectable, and easy to extend.

name: Lifemap - Find Your Purpose
tagline: Beging Your New Life Journey
description: Lifemap is a life-planning and coaching app built from a proven framework. It guides users through a proven 7-step process to gain clarity, define direction, and turn intentions into action.

name: ReachLLM
tagline: Dominate the AI Search Era
description: ReachLLM - The leading AI Search & LLM Visibility Platform. Official website of ReachLLM for brand optimization across ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude & all major AI models. Trusted by thousands of brands worldwide. Beyond AI visibility tracking, it has the Agentic capability to set out a strategy to help brands create the RIGHT content and all the actions they need to take to increase the visibility.

name: Qrystal Uplink
tagline: The cloud-based watchdog for IoT.
description: Stop building custom backends to track IoT uptime. Qrystal Uplink is a cloud-based watchdog for ESP32 & embedded fleets. We use "fail-closed" logic: if your device goes silent (crash, power loss, freeze), we alert you instantly via Email (as well as Slack, Telegram, etc. in the future). Replace weeks of infrastructure work with 5 minutes of integration: ‚Ä¢ Officially maintained platform SDKs. ‚Ä¢ One line of code. ‚Ä¢ No servers to manage. Focus on your firmware. Let us handle the plumbing.

name: Train Custom AI on Face & Style
tagline: Create high-quality thumbnails with your face or style
description: Training AI for thumbnails used to be slow, inconsistent, and expensive. Now you can train face & style thumbnails in seconds. Outputs are sharper, text is cleaner, and styles are consistent. Training cost reduced from 20 ‚Üí 5 credits. Built for creators who want clickable, consistent thumbnails without fighting AI. This is the biggest upgrade we‚Äôve shipped so far.

name: KeepHer
tagline: The personal assistant for your relationship.
description: Most relationship apps are just shared calendars. Keeper is an active "relationship coach" that ensures you never forget the little things. Unlike generic reminders, Keeper uses smart logic to keep the spark alive: ‚Ä¢ Smart Period Tracker: Predicts cycles & reminds you to buy specific snacks 3 days prior üç´ ‚Ä¢ Date Night Monitor: Automatically nudges you if it's been >14 days since a date üç∑ ‚Ä¢ Flower Tracker: Tracks purchase history and reminds you every 60 days üíê

name: Browser Lock
tagline: Stop nosy roommates & coworkers from stalking your tabs
description: Your browser = nobody's business. Lock it with a password. üîê One-click browser lock ‚è±Ô∏è Auto-lock when idle üéØ Lock specific tabs (banking, dating, job search) üö´ Zero tracking Stop nosy coworkers & roommates from stalking your tabs. Perfect for shared computers at work, libraries, home. Built for privacy, not cheating.

name: Gapwise
tagline: Uncover pain points, generate ideas, and find your next app
description: Gapwise analyzes Reddit conversations to help you discover what people actually want. Enter a topic, subreddit, or competitor URL to uncover unmet needs, generate validated product ideas, compare opportunities, and get AI builder prompts for instant prototyping. Stop guessing what to build‚Äîlet real user discussions guide you. Coming soon: expansion beyond Reddit to multiple platforms.

name: WebsiteKit
tagline: Every FREAKN' website tool, in one place. Tools as a service
description: WebsiteKit is a FREE toolkit for preparing websites for production by generating essential setup assets (SEO, favicons, security headers, privacy policies, cookie consent, JSON-LD schemas) in one place. Configure website assets once and reuse them across all generators. No login required, immediate value. It focuses on web fundamentals not building websites, but preparing them for production. 15+ live tools currently, Goal: 100+ tools and making it the largest tool library on the internet!

name: Lumimmo
tagline: Professional photos in 30s - Pay per use, not per month
description: Lumimmo transforms your photos into professional visuals in 30 seconds using AI. Unlike other tools, no monthly subscription - just pay-as-you-go credits. Perfect for real estate, e-commerce, and content creators. GDPR compliant, hosted in Europe.

name: OutreachOS
tagline: STOP LOSING LEADS TO THE FEED
description: LinkedIn CRM for solopreneurs. Organize your network, save contacts ( any LinkedIn profile, steal from your competitors comment section and linkedin search results), and make your pipeline organized. Overcome LinkedIn limits. Created by Sayem.

name: Find My Stack
tagline: Find the Perfect Software Stack for Your Business
description: AI-powered software discovery for SMBs. Get personalized ERP, HRMS, CRM, and accounting tool recommendations with real pricing, pros/cons, and implementation roadmaps all for ‚Çπ499. No signup needed. Trusted by 10,000+ searches.

name: Macabolic - Video Downloader for macOS
tagline: Native, fast and beautiful video downloader for macOS.
description: Macabolic is a native, open-source video downloader designed specifically for macOS. Built with SwiftUI, it offers a fast, lightweight and clutter-free experience that feels right at home on your Mac. Key Features: üé¨ Support for thousands of sites via yt-dlp. üöÄ Native performance with a clean, modern UI. üìã Full playlist and batch download support. No ads, no tracking, no subscriptions. Just a simple tool that does one thing perfectly.

name: Dukonix
tagline: Mobile-first inventory & sales for small businesses
description: Dukonix is a mobile-first inventory and sales app for small businesses. Manage products, track stock, and record sales directly from your phone‚Äîwithout spreadsheets or complex POS systems. Built for independent shops that need a simple, reliable way to run daily operations anywhere. Available on iOS and Android. Free to get started.

name: Atoms
tagline: X-ray vision for any website. SEO + CSS in one hover.
description: Atoms reveals the building blocks of any webpage. SEO strategy + CSS extraction in one tool. Hover to analyze, Every website is made of atoms‚Äîheadings, colors, links, schema, spacing. Atoms lets you see them all without opening DevTools. Two modes. Zero friction. SEO Mode (Hover): Move your cursor over any element to see what matters for rankings‚Äîstructure, schema, links, meta info. CSS Mode (Click): Click to extract colors, typography, spacing, and Tailwind class
